[
    For {
        init: [
            AssignmentOperation(
                Assign {
                    left: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    6,
                                ),
                                name: "i",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        9,
                    ),
                    right: LiteralInteger {
                        span: Span(
                            3,
                            11,
                        ),
                        value: "0",
                    },
                },
            ),
            AssignmentOperation(
                Assign {
                    left: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    14,
                                ),
                                name: "i",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        17,
                    ),
                    right: LiteralInteger {
                        span: Span(
                            3,
                            19,
                        ),
                        value: "1",
                    },
                },
            ),
        ],
        condition: [
            ComparisonOperation(
                LessThan {
                    left: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    22,
                                ),
                                name: "j",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        25,
                    ),
                    right: LiteralInteger {
                        span: Span(
                            3,
                            27,
                        ),
                        value: "2",
                    },
                },
            ),
            ArithmeticOperation(
                PostDecrement {
                    left: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span(
                                    3,
                                    30,
                                ),
                                name: "j",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                    span: Span(
                        3,
                        32,
                    ),
                },
            ),
        ],
        loop: [],
        then: [],
    },
]
